description: Erection of 7 storey building comprising ground floor gym [437sqm] and 2 x 1-bed and 37 x 2-bed flats above and a 3 storey building comprising 4 x one-bedroom and 4 x three-bedroom flats (47 flats in total) including the creation of new vehicular access, 15no. Parking spaces, landscaping and children's play space, following the demolition of the existing buildings on site.
